titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2429) to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide for an increase in the Federal minimum wage.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2429) to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide for an increase in the Federal minimum wage.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Barrow. Petition No: 109-11.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2429) to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide for an increase in the Federal minimum wage.
